summary: After a series of misunderstandings, the head of an aerospace research laboratory begins to suspect his new girlfriend is a Russian spy.
cast: Doris Day|Rod Taylor|Arthur Godfrey|John McGiver|Paul Lynde|Edward Andrews|Eric Fleming|Dom DeLuise|Dick Martin|Elisabeth Fraser|George Tobias|Alice Pearce|Ellen Corby|Dee J. Thompson|Richard Alden|Don Anderson|Shirley Anthony|Ellen Atterbury|Bella Bruck|William Burnside|Boyd Cabeen|Regina Carrol|Pat Casella|Jerry Catron|George Cisar|Robert Cole|Bill Cord|John Dennis|Dick Dial|Ken DuMain|Roy Eason|James Gonzalez|M. title: Una sirena sospechosa
